original_text: and lay his hand on the head of the sin offering and kill it for a sin offering in the place where they kill the burnt offering.
korean_text: 그 속죄제 제물의 머리에 안수하고 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 속죄제물로 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and lay his hand on the head of the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 속죄 제물의 머리에 손을 얹고

sentences.original_text: and kill it for a sin offering
in the place where they kill the burnt offering
